title: Watch Face Red Art
summary: Red watch face for all screen types with support most modern smartwatches.

description: Watch face with:- day, month and week- Weather widget (forecast for 4 days)- steps counter- battery levelWorking fine on all newest and oldest models: moto360 2gen., TAG Heuer Connected, Sony SW3, LG G W100, LG R W110, Asus Zen Watch and others.Configuration supported languages- English- Français- Deutsch- Українська- Русский- 中文 （繁體）Note: to work correctly reading the number of steps necessary to synchronize the clock with Google Fit app on your smartphone.
descriptionHTML:
Watch face with:
- day, month and week
- Weather widget (forecast for 4 days)
- steps counter
- battery level

Working fine on all newest and oldest models: moto360 2gen., TAG Heuer Connected, Sony SW3, LG G W100, LG R W110, Asus Zen Watch and others.

Configuration supported languages
- English
- Français
- Deutsch
- Українська
- Русский
- 中文 （繁體）

Note: to work correctly reading the number of steps necessary to synchronize the clock with Google Fit app on your smartphone.
